name: Lofi Swing
description:
Hi everyone,

This is a small university project created with our love and effort. We had a lot of fun creating and playing the game, and we are really proud of the results. Thanks to this game we passed the subject with honors. 

The game takes arround 15 min to complete. We like to consider it as a relaxing experience, depending on your control with the swinging.

All feedback to improve the game or just to comment if you liked it will be much appreciated.

We hope you like it!

Ezequiel and Sergio

Art: 

  • Block textures - Julio Sillet
  • Animals - Acorn Bringer

Music: 

  • Sleepy Fish - Bookshelves
  • Sleepy Fish x Philanthrope - Space Cadet
  • Psalm Trees x Guillaume Muschalle - bringmesun
